div.style: font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); text-align: center; white-space: pre-wrap;

span.span: On March 27, Governor Michelle Lujan-Grisham and PED Secretary Ryan Stewart announced that New Mexico public schools will be closed for the remainder of the school year. While we are not physically in school, instruction, food distribution and more are continuing. Please visit Our Coronavirus Updates Page
to stay up-to-date on the latest information.

Recent Releases:
Superintendent Garcia Announces Second-Round Winners of "Superintendent's Challenge"
span.a: Superintendent Garcia Announces First-Round Winners of "Superintendent's Challenge"

a.title: Link
a.span: Superintendent Garcia's Letter to Parents on Remote Learning

span.a: SFPS Superintendent Launches “Superintendent’s Challenge” to Keep Student Minds Sharp, Will Award $25,000 in Cash, Gift Cards

span.style: font-size: large; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: The Office of the Governor and the New Mexico Public Education Department has established the below hotlines for your use related to COVID-19:

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: center;
div.span: - Childcare, food insecurity, supplies, loss of income: 1-833-551-0518 - CHRISTUS St. Vincent Info Page (Spanish) : Click here - Santa Fe Public Schools would like to remind students and families that free behavioral health services via video conferencing and telephone calls are available to all SFPS families through our partnership with The Sky Center. Any family seeking support is encouraged to schedule an appointment. All services are free to members of our community with a child in the household between the ages of 0-23. If you are concerned about depression, anxiety, relationship conflict, suicidal behavior, or other behavioral health issues, please call The Sky Center at 505-473-6191. - Earth Care New Mexico - Click here to view their Mutual Aid Resources

span.strong: Santa Fe Public School Coronavirus Updates

span.br: Santa Fe Public Schools is always working to provide you with the latest information and preparations. Click the button below for updated info.

SFPS Board of Education
Audit Sub-Committee Meeting
Thursday, April 16th, 12:00 PM
Link to join meeting: meet.google.com/gwj-xksn-peo
Or join by phone: US: +1 218 301-8486
Pin: 964 775 362#
SFPS Board of Education
Finance Sub-Committee Meeting
Thursday, April 16th, 4:00 PM
Link to join meeting:
https://zoom.us/j/563941651?pwd=Z3dLR0dTT282S3lvamFPc0gyT0Yxdz09
Or join by phone:
US: +1 669 900 9128
For Public Forum, please send comment (up to 450 words) to public_forum@sfps.k12.nm.us
Please follow the guidelines of Public Forum.

a.title: Click here to read the article.

p.span: Superintendent Dr. Veronica C. Garcia wrote a column in the Albuquerque Journal about the remote learning at Santa Fe Public Schools, which begins Monday, March 30th.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1em; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); font-family: georgia, serif; font-size: 17.6px;
p.span: The Santa Fe Public Schools is blowing up the concept of how teachers teach and students learn.

p.style: box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0px 0px 1em; color: rgb(38, 38, 38); font-family: georgia, serif; font-size: 17.6px;
p.span:
On Monday, March 30, we will launch an ambitious remote learning initiative in response to school closures. To our families and students: Hang on to your hats! The educational journey will be bumpy. To our community: We are setting in motion unparalleled change in how we do business.
To read the rest of the article, click here.

br.a: Click here for a message from Superintendent Dr. Veronica C. Garcia regarding "Enhancing Equity and Excellence: A Roadmap to Reinvention"

span.a: See the Framework Presented to the Board of Education

table.style: text-align: start; font-size: 16px; width: 1092px; height: 365px; left: 133px;

td.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; text-align: center; vertical-align: bottom;

strong.style: color: rgb(84, 141, 212); font-family: Tahoma; text-align: right;
strong.span: Preschool Lottery Application For 2020-2021 Is Now Available!

span.style: font-size: medium; letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

td.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; vertical-align: bottom;

span.span: Santa Fe Public Schools hosts an annual lottery process for parents who wish to enroll

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Applications are currently being accepted beginning March 1,

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Applications received after 11:59 p.m. on May 3,

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.25pt; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: will not be included in the lottery and will be placed on the waiting list in the order in which they are received.

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; text-align: center; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: The lottery will be held on Wednesday, May 15,

span.style: letter-spacing: 0.25pt; text-align: center; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
letter-spacing: 0.25pt; text-align: center; font-size: medium; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

td.style: font-family: Roboto, RobotoDraft, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; margin: 0px; text-align: center; vertical-align: top;

span.strong: Click A Button Below To Submit Your On-Line Preschool Lottery Application:

span.style: font-size: large; font-family: Tahoma; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

br.span: Kaune is now accepting applications for the summer program and 2020/21 school year
SFPS is proud to support the United Way sponsored PreK program that operates independently from SFPS, but well serves our community of Santa Fe.
Click the English/Spanish picture below to apply.
